description.zh-cn: 清朝初期的女政治家，蒙古科尔沁部人。先后辅佐皇太极、顺治帝、康熙帝，对清朝初年的政治稳定和发展有重要影响，是清朝入关后的政权奠基人之一。
description.en: A female politician in the early Qing dynasty from the Khorchin Mongol tribe. She successively assisted Hong Taiji, the Shunzhi Emperor, and the Kangxi Emperor, playing a significant role in the political stability and development of the early Qing dynasty and was one of the key founders of the Qing regime after entering the Shanhai Pass.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第二位皇帝，孝庄太皇太后的丈夫。
description.en: The second emperor of the Qing dynasty, husband of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第三位皇帝，清朝入关后的首位皇帝，孝庄太皇太后之子。
description.en: The third emperor of the Qing dynasty and the first after entering the Shanhai Pass, son of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第四位皇帝，孝庄太皇太后之孙。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Qing dynasty, grandson of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝初年重要政治家、军事家，皇太极之弟，顺治帝时期的摄政王。
description.en: An important statesman and military leader in the early Qing dynasty, brother of Hong Taiji, and Prince Regent during the Shunzhi Emperor's reign.

description.zh-cn: 清朝初年权臣，康熙帝早期的辅政大臣之一。
description.en: A powerful minister in the early Qing dynasty, one of the four regents during the early reign of the Kangxi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙年间，由吴三桂、耿精忠、尚之信发动的大规模叛乱。
description.en: A large-scale rebellion against the Qing dynasty during the reign of the Kangxi Emperor, launched by Wu Sangui, Geng Jingzhong, and Shang Zhixin.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古科尔沁部贝勒，孝庄太皇太后之父。
description.en: A beile of the Mongol Khorchin tribe, father of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 寨桑之妻，孝庄太皇太后之母。
description.en: Wife of Zaisang, mother of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极的皇后，孝庄太皇太后的姑姑。
description.en: The empress of Hong Taiji, aunt of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极的妃子，孝庄太皇太后的姐姐。
description.en: A consort of Hong Taiji, older sister of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极长子，曾与多尔衮争夺皇位。
description.en: The eldest son of Hong Taiji, who contended with Dorgon for the throne.

description.zh-cn: 后金的建立者，皇太极之父。
description.en: Founder of the Later Jin dynasty, father of Hong Taiji.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古的一个部落，孝庄太皇太后的出生地。
description.en: A Mongol tribe, the birthplace of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极与孝庄太皇太后的长女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Hong Taiji and Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极与孝庄太皇太后的次女。
description.en: The second daughter of Hong Taiji and Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极与孝庄太皇太后的三女。
description.en: The third daughter of Hong Taiji and Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄太皇太后的兄长。
description.en: Older brother of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄太皇太后的兄长。
description.en: Older brother of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的中国明清两代皇家宫殿，孝庄太皇太后在此长期居住并逝世。
description.en: The Chinese imperial palace for the Ming and Qing dynasties located in Beijing, where Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang lived for a long time and passed away.

description.zh-cn: 1625年，布木布泰嫁给皇太极为福晋。
description.en: In 1625, Bumbutai married Hong Taiji as his fujin (consort).

description.zh-cn: 福临（顺治帝）是孝庄太皇太后与皇太极所生之子。
description.en: Fulin (the Shunzhi Emperor) was the son of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang and Hong Taiji.

description.zh-cn: 福临（顺治帝）是皇太极的第九子。
description.en: Fulin (the Shunzhi Emperor) was the ninth son of Hong Taiji.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄太皇太后是科尔沁贝勒寨桑之女。
description.en: Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang was the daughter of the Khorchin beile Zaisang.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄太皇太后是寨桑之妻科尔沁次妃博礼所生。
description.en: Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang was born to Boli, the secondary consort of Zaisang.

description.zh-cn: 玄烨（康熙帝）是福临（顺治帝）的第三子，孝庄太皇太后的孙子。
description.en: Xuanye (the Kangxi Emperor) was the third son of Fulin (the Shunzhi Emperor) and the grandson of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 扶植并大力培育康熙帝，是其政治启蒙者，协助其扳倒鳌拜势力并平定三藩之乱，为康雍乾盛世奠定了基础。
description.en: She enthroned and diligently nurtured the Kangxi Emperor, serving as his political mentor, assisting him in overthrowing Oboi's faction and suppressing the Revolt of the Three Feudatories, laying the foundation for the High Qing era.

description.zh-cn: 在皇太极驾崩后，与多尔衮联手拥立其子福临为帝，并共同辅政，稳定清初政权。
description.en: After Hong Taiji's death, she allied with Dorgon to enthrone her son Fulin and they jointly governed as regents, stabilizing the early Qing regime.

description.zh-cn: 在皇太极死后的皇位争夺中，运用政治手段确保其子福临成功即位。
description.en: In the struggle for the throne after Hong Taiji's death, she used political maneuvering to ensure her son Fulin's successful accession.

description.zh-cn: 在皇位争夺中与孝庄太皇太后联手，拥立福临为帝，并担任摄政王。
description.en: In the struggle for the throne, he allied with Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang to enthrone Fulin and served as Prince Regent.

description.zh-cn: 在康熙帝亲政初期，协助康熙帝拉拢索尼家族，最终扳倒了鳌拜的政治势力。
description.en: In the early years of the Kangxi Emperor's personal rule, she assisted him in winning over the Soni family to eventually topple Oboi's political faction.

description.zh-cn: 在三藩之乱期间全力支持康熙帝平乱。
description.en: During the Revolt of the Three Feudatories, she fully supported the Kangxi Emperor in suppressing the rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄太皇太后是孝端文皇后的侄女。
description.en: Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang was the niece of Empress Xiaoduanwen.

description.zh-cn: 敏惠恭和元妃（海兰珠）是孝庄太皇太后的姐姐。
description.en: Consort Minhui Gonghe Yuan (Harjol) was the older sister of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 乌克善是孝庄太皇太后的兄长。
description.en: Ukšan was the older brother of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 满珠习礼是孝庄太皇太后的兄长。
description.en: Manjusri was the older brother of Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang.

description.zh-cn: 在皇太极死后，两人为争夺皇位而对立。
description.en: After Hong Taiji's death, the two were rivals in the struggle for the throne.

description.zh-cn: 皇太极是努尔哈赤的第八子。
description.en: Hong Taiji was the eighth son of Nurhaci.

description.zh-cn: 孝端文皇后（哲哲）是皇太极的正室皇后。
description.en: Empress Xiaoduanwen (Jerjer) was the primary empress consort of Hong Taiji.

description.zh-cn: 敏惠恭和元妃（海兰珠）是皇太极的宸妃。
description.en: Consort Minhui Gonghe Yuan (Harjol) was a consort of Hong Taiji.

description.zh-cn: 孝庄太皇太后出生于蒙古科尔沁部。
description.en: Empress Dowager Xiaozhuang was born in the Mongol Khorchin tribe.
